short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to inject back-to-top button in every website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes when I reading some articles from some web, there's no back-to-top button for me to scroll top instantly. For the inconvenient reason, I create this extension that inject a back-to-top button if the page has scrollbar.
